About Me

     I've recently graduated with my mechanical engineering degree from Florida Institute of Technology. Right now, I'm looking for work related to my field and interest. Art and engineering are two words that define them. No, I'm not your next Leonardo, but I strive to learn and accomplish challenges given upon myself whether that be designing a conveyor belt system or rendering photo-realistic objects.
